title: Molly-Mae Hague flashes her assets in a Tomb Raider inspired Halloween shoot
text:
She's no stranger to commanding attention in fashionable looks.

And Molly-Mae Hague looked fantastic as she embraced the Halloween spirit and created a Tomb Raider inspired look with PrettyLittleThing on Friday.

The Love Island star, 20, flaunted her toned figure and showed some underboob under a tiny top as she posed up a storm for the spooky shoot.

All dressed up: Molly-Mae Hague, 20, looked sensational as she embraced the Halloween spirit and created a gory yet sexy Tomb Raider inspired look with PrettyLittleThing

Molly-Mae paired the tiny black high-neck top which flashed her assets with some high-waisted shorts.

She also added studded cross straps around her thighs which had silver studs on the front along with a harness over her body which held a small purse.

The Instagram personality, who has already launched her own clothing range with Pretty Little Thing, put particular effort into her scary makeup.

Looking good: The Love Island star wore a tiny black high-neck top which flashed her assets with some high-waisted shorts for the photoshoot - showing off some serious underboob

Poser: Molly-Mae added a harness with a purse holder and some studs to her ensemble as she posed in front of a leafy setting

Molly-Mae sported fake blood on her left arm and added a small bit above her eye and under her lip - which matched the creepy red effect created under her eyes.

To complete the look Molly-Mae added some bold pink eye-shadow which had a touch of sparkle and had a shiny nude lipgloss.

For the shoot, the star's trademark blonde hair was tied back and styled into a long plait which she rested over her shoulder.

Spooky: She later slipped into a pink robe embroidered with Pretty Little Thing which high-lighted her pink eye-shadow and pastel pink lipgloss

Fashion: Molly-Mae has designed her own range for PLT as well as modelling for the brand

Later in the shoot Molly slipped into a pink satin robe embroidered with Pretty Little Thing which complemented her glossy lipstick and eye-shadow.

The glamorous Halloween shoot comes after Molly-Mae branded her mother Debbie 'savage' after she jokingly tore into her personal appearance.

She took to Instagram on Sunday to share a clip of Debbie hurling insults, saying she had 'ugly small hands, podgy knees and has put on six stone since leaving the villa'.

Scary: Molly also sported fake blood on her arms, legs and face to complete the spooky look

Molly-Mae captioned the video: 'She kills me. And you guys all thought she was savage to me in the villa... this is just the way we are.'

Back in August, Molly-Mae was said to have had a series of therapy sessions during her six day digital detox after facing such vitriol from trolls online.

The social media influencer who has 3.4million followers, was said to have found the online abuse 'incredibly upsetting' and she chose to take a temporary break from Instagram, according to reports.

A source told The Sun: 'She decided to take up the offer of therapy to try and get her head around it all and hopefully get back to her old self soon.'
description: She's no stranger to commanding attention in fashionable looks.
